name: Аналогии
description: Дословно: хороший меч не стареет. А если по-русски то: старый конь борозды не испортит или тряхнуть стариной.
Дословно: один камень - две птицы. По-нашему будет конечно же - одним выстрелом убить двух зайцев.
Дословно: утопить лодку и разбить котел. Т.е. сжечь мосты, исключить пути к отступлению.
Дословно: днем видеть сны. Русские аналоги: витать в облаках, строить замки из песка. Т.е. предаваться малосбыточным мечтам.
Дословно: любишь дом - люби и ворона (на крыше). любишь кататься - люби и санки возить.
Дословно: материала много, а пользы мало. Велика фигура, да дура по-русски.
Дословно: нарисовав дракона подрисовать зрачки. Иначе: последний штрих, вишенка на торте.
Дословно: камень утонул в море. По-нашему: кануть в воду, бесследно исчезнуть.
Дословно: слева, справа - становится трудно. Куда ни киннь - везде клин
Дословно: зуб менять на зуб. У нас - глаз за глаз
Дословно: Мутная вода, нащупывать рыбу. По-нашему: ловить рыбу в мутной воде
Дословно: На половину войти в землю. По-нашему: одной ногой в могиле, дышать на ладан.
Дословно: начало, конец - сног на голову. По-нашему: ставить телегу впереди лошади
Дословно: беда с неба падает. Как снег на голову

Голова тяжелая, а ноги леггие. По-нашему: колосс на глинянных ногах
. Говорится о чем то массивном, но не устойчивом.
Дословно: Плакать, смеяться не получается. По-нашему: смех сквозь слезы.
answer:
宝刀不老
bǎo dāo bù lǎo

一石二鸟
yī shí èr niǎo

沉舟破釜
chén zhōu pò fǔ

白日做梦
bái rì zuò mèng

ài wū jí wū

大材小用
dà cái xiǎo yòng

画龙点睛
huà lóng diǎn jīng

shí chén dà hǎi

左右为难
zuǒ yòu wéi nán

yǐ yá huán yá

hún shuǐ mō yú

半截入土
bàn jié rù tǔ

本末倒置
běn mò dǎo zhì

祸从天降
huò cóng tiān jiàng

头重脚轻
tóu zhòng jiǎo qīng

kū xiào bù dé

name: Urgency
description: a hundred weight hanging by a hair—in imminent peril</br>在这****, 万分危急的时候, 援军到了</br>Zài zhè qiānjūnyīfà, wànfēn wēijí de shíhou, yuánjūn dàoliǎo.</br>In this moment of extreme crisis when everything was hanging by a single thread, the relief troops arrived.
brook no delay; demand immediate attention; be of great urgency</br>****的行动</br>action which brooks no delay

very impatient; unable to hold back; too impatient to wait; anxious to do sth</br>他们都****地想知道发生了什么事。</br>Tāmen dōu pòbùjídài de xiǎng zhīdao fāshēng le shénme shì.</br>They were impatient to know what had happened
most urgent; post-haste; express; Most Urgent [formerly on dispatches]</br>****的电报
The fire is singeing the eyebrows.—a desperate situation; at a crucial point</br>****的事儿</br>matter of the utmost urgency

as pressing as a fire singeing one's eyebrows—extremely urgent</br>母亲寄来两万块钱, 解了我****</br>Mǔqin jìlái liǎngwàn kuài qián, jiě le wǒ ránméizhījí.</br>Mother sent me 20,000 yuan addressing my pressing need.
answer:
千钧一发
qiān jūn yī fà

刻不容缓
kè bù róng huǎn

迫不及待
pò bù jí dài

十万火急
shí wàn huǒ jí

火烧眉毛
huǒ shāo méi máo

燃眉之急
rán méi zhī jí

name: Insects
description: a moth darting into a flame—bring destruction upon oneself; seek one's own doom</br>
slip out of a predicament like a cicada sloughing its skin—escape by cunning manoeuvring</br>
pluck the laurel branch from the Toad Palace—succeed in the highest imperial examinations</br>
nibble like a silkworm or swallow like a whale—seize another country's territory by piecemeal encroachment or wholesale annexation; annex and encroach upon (another country's territory)</br>
like a dragon fly skimming the surface of the water—just touch on sth. lightly without going into it deeply
a mantis trying to obstruct a chariot—overrate oneself and try to hold back an overwhelming force</br>
thread of a spider and trail of a horse—clues; traces
covet gains ahead without being aware of danger behind as the mantis stalk the cicade,unaware of the oriole behind
answer:
飞蛾扑火
fēi é pū huǒ

金蝉脱壳
jīn chán tuō qiào

蛾眉皓齒
é méi hào chǐ

蚕食鲸吞
cán shí jīng tūn

蜻蜓点水
qīng tíng diǎn shuǐ

螳臂挡车
táng bì dǎng chē

蛛丝马迹
zhū sī mǎ jì

螳螂捕蝉
táng láng bǔ chán
full version
螳螂捕蝉，黄雀在后
táng láng bǔ chán, huáng què zài hòu
examples: 做调查工作不能蜻蜓点水, 要深入实际</br>Zuò diàochá gōngzuò bù néng qīngtíngdiǎnshuǐ, yào shēnrù shíjì.</br>To make an investigation, one should go into matters deeply, not just scratch the surface.
此案有蛛丝马迹可寻。</br>There are clues in the case.

name: Animals
description: all things take on a new aspect; everything looks new and fresh</br>(in the spring) nature takes on a new look (idiom)</br>
cover the head and sneak away like a rat—scurry (or scamper) off like a frightened rat</br>
crowing like a cock and stealing like a dog (idiom)</br>
magnificent army with thousands of men and horses (idiom); impressive display of manpower</br>all the King's horses and all the King's men</br>
To mend the pen after sheep are lost (idiom)</br>
To see a bow reflected in a cup as a snake (idiom); fig. unnecessary suspicions</br>overly fearful
A crane in a flock of chicken (idiom); way above the common</br>manifestly superior
play the lute to a cow—address the wrong audience; talk over sb.'s head</br>to cast pearls before swine</br>
like a stranded fish put back into water [said of one in his proper surroundings or having got a great aid]
lit. birdsong and fragrant flowers (idiom); fig. the intoxication of a beautiful spring day
hold a candle to the devil </br>play the jackal to the tiger—help a rascal commit villainy</br>(idiom) to act as accomplice to the tiger; to help a villain do evil
The (proverbial) Guizhou donkey has exhausted its tricks.—at one's wit's end; at the end of one's rope
A mouse can see only an inch.—see only what is under one's nose; be short-sighted
have a back like a tiger's and a waist like a bear's—tough and stocky
stand by a stump waiting for hares bump into it—trust to luck; wait for a windfall
white hair and ruddy complexion—healthy in old age; hale and hearty
answer: 万象更新 </br> wàn xiàng gēng xīn
抱头鼠窜 </br> bào tóu shǔ cuàn
鸡鸣狗盗 </br> jī míng gǒu dào
千军万马 </br> qiān jūn wàn mǎ
亡羊补牢 </br> wáng yáng bǔ láo
杯弓蛇影 </br> bēi gōng shé yǐng

对牛弹琴 </br> duì niú tán qín
如鱼得水 </br> rú yú dé shuǐ

为虎作伥 </br> wèi hǔ zuò chāng </>伥</br>ghost of a man who fell victim to a tiger, yet helps the tiger to devour others
黔驴技穷 </br> qián lǘ jì qióng
鼠目寸光 </br> shǔ mù cùn guāng
虎背熊腰 </br> hǔ bèi xióng yāo
守株待兔 </br> shǒu zhū dài tù

examples: 鸡鸣狗盗之徒</br>mean people who resort to petty tricks
亡羊补牢, 犹未为晚</br>Wángyángbǔláo, yóu wèi wéi wǎn</br>It is not too late to mend the fold even after the sheep is lost. or It’s never too late to try.

name: Spring
description: sunlit and enchanting scene of spring; lovely spring sunshine
riot (or blaze) of colour; thousands of purples and reds; a profusion of flourishing trades
Rain in spring is as precious as oil
full of vitality
spring colours filling the garden
Spring is in the air
Birds sing and flowers give forth fragrance (as on a fine spring day); lit. birdsong and fragrant flowers (idiom); fig. the intoxication of a beautiful spring day
Spring has come and the flowers are in bloom
let a hundred flowers bloom—free development of different artistic forms and styles
gentle breeze and light rain—in a gentle and mild way

春光明媚
chūn guāng míng mèi

wàn zǐ qiān hóng

chūn yǔ rú yóu

生机勃勃
shēng jī bó bó

春色满园
chūn sè mǎn yuán

chūn yì àng rán

niǎo yǔ huā xiāng

chūn nuǎn huā kāi

hé fēng xì yǔ
examples: 百花盛开，万紫千红</br>Bǎihuā shèngkāi, wànzǐqiānhóng</br>Flowers of all sorts are blooming in a riot of colour.

春色满园关不住, 一枝红杏出墙来</br>chūnsèmǎnyuán guānbuzhù, yī zhī hóngxìngchūqiáng lái</br>Spring colours fill the garden but cannot all be contained. | For one spray of red apricot blossoms peeps out from the wall.
和风细雨地开展批评和自我批评</br>héfēngxìyǔ de kāizhǎn pīpíng hé zìwǒ pīpíng</br>make criticism and self-criticism in the manner of 'a gentle breeze and a mild rain'

name: Dragon
description: endless stream of horse and carriages; heavy traffic
doughty as a dragon and lively as a tiger
lit. the dragon wars, the tiger battles; fierce battle between giants
the spirit of a dragon horse; old but still full of vitality (idiom)
lively and vigorous in calligraphy
dragons rising and tigers leaping (a scene of bustling activity)
dangerous spot as a dragon's pool and tiger's den--a danger spot
walk like a dragon and pace like a tiger; a mighty and awe-inspiring bearing

车水马龙
chē shuǐ mǎ lóng

shēng lóng huó hǔ

龙争虎斗
lóng zhēng hǔ dòu

龙马精神
lóng mǎ jīng shén

龙飞凤舞
lóng fēi fèng wǔ

龙腾虎跃
lóng téng hǔ yuè

龙潭虎穴
lóng tán hǔ xué

龙骧虎步
lóng xiāng hǔ bù
examples: 越南河内的夜晚，街道人流拥挤、车水马龙</br>yuè nán hé nèi de yè wǎn ， jiē dào rén liú yōng jǐ 、 chē shuǐ mǎ lóng</br>The streets of Hanoi bustled with evening traffic and pedestrians.
这种自由能让你生龙活虎</br>zhè zhǒng zì yóu néng ràng nǐ shēng lóng huó hǔ</br>This freedom can energize you.
他们会在《龙争虎斗IV》中砍杀人头、断人脊骨</br>tā mén huì zài 《 lóng zhēng hǔ dǒu IV》 zhōng kǎn shā rén tóu 、 duàn rén jǐ gǔ</br>They are severing heads and snapping spines in Mortal Kombat IV.
祝好运、健康、龙马精神伴你度过一个快乐新年</br>zhù hǎo yùn 、 jiàn kāng 、 lóng mǎ jīng shén bàn nǐ dù guò yī gè kuài lè xīn nián</br>Good luck, good health, good cheer. I wish you a happy New Year

所以，他一边龙飞凤舞一边说，我在军团的职责是什么呢</br>suǒ yǐ ， tā yī biān lóng fēi fèng wǔ yī biān shuō ， wǒ zài jūn tuán de zhí zé shì shén me ne</br>So, he said as he was scrawling, what will be my duties with the company?
同时，祝愿IT精英们在各自的领域里龙腾虎跃</br>tóng shí ， zhù yuàn IT jīng yīng mén zài gè zì de lǐng yù lǐ lóng téng hǔ yuè</br>Meanwhile, we wish IT elites thriving in their own fields,
潭 tán - deep pool, pond
骧 xiāng - to run friskily, to raise, to hold high

description: cheering excitedly; jubilant</br>
crow and peacock make no sound; absolute silence; not a single voice can be heard; absolute silence</br>
the fabled roc flies ten thousand miles; one's future prospects are brilliant</br>
wind sighing and crane calling; fig. to panic at the slightest move; to be jittery</br>
to be advanced in age</br>

hè lì jī qún

fēng shēng hè lì

examples: 一小时以后，营救船又在雾中出现，村民们欢呼雀跃地跑去迎接</br> yī xiǎoshí yǐhòu ， yíngjiùchuán yòu zài wù zhōng chūxiàn ， cūnmínmén huānhūquèyuè dì pǎoqù yíngjiē</br>An hour later, the rescue boat reappeared through the fog and the cheering villagers ran to greet them.
突然一切都变得鸦雀无声</br>tūrán yīqiēdoū biàndé yāquèwúshēng</br>Suddenly, everything grew quiet
祝你新年快乐，鹏程万里！</br>zhù nǐ xīnnián kuàilè ， péngchéngwànlǐ</br>Wish you a happy New Year, and promising future!
犯了罪的人总是感到风声鹤唳</br>fàn le zuì de rén zǒngshì gǎndào fēngshēnghèlì</br>A guilty man apprehends danger in every sound.

现代科技使每个人延长生命，但活愈老，长得愈老，鸡皮鹤发不是别人观感问题，而是妳的自我认同问题</br>xiàndài kējì shǐ měigèrén yáncháng shēngmìng ， dàn huó yù lǎo ， cháng dé yù lǎo ， jīpíhèfā bùshì biérén guāngǎn wèntí ， érshì tade zìwǒ rèntóng wèntí</br>Modern science and technology enables everybody to live a long life, but we still grow old. To have chicken skin and snowy hair is not just a problem for other people, but one that you and I face too.

name: Anger, detest
description: to get really angry
lit. hair stands up in anger and tips off one's hat (idiom); fig. seething in anger; raise one's hackles
suddenly become very angry
spitting anger; in a rage
gnashing one's teeth; displaying extreme anger; fuming with rage between gritted teeth
to detest bitterly; implacable hatred; to abhor; anathema
to hate evil as one hates an enemy
to hate somebody to the bone
answer:
火冒三丈
huǒ mào sān zhàng
他的评论把她气得火冒三丈
tāde pínglùn bǎ tā qìdé huǒmàosānzhàng
She was seething with rage at his remarks
他顽固不化把我气得火冒三丈
tā wángùbùhuà bǎwǒ qìdé huǒmàosānzhàng
His obstinacy drives me mad!

怒发冲冠
nù fā chōng guān

勃然大怒
bó rán dà nù

怒气冲冲
nù qì chōngchōng
他拒绝接受选举结果，起身怒气冲冲地离开了会场
tā jùjué jiēshòu xuǎnjǔ jiéguǒ ， qǐshēn nùqìchōngchōng de líkāi le huìcháng
Refusing to accept the decision of the vote, he got up and stormed out of the meeting

咬牙切齿
yǎo yá qiē chǐ
我咬牙切齿愤怒已极
wǒ yǎoyáqiēchǐ fènnù yǐjí
I was gnashing my teeth with rage.

疾恶如仇

zài hènzhīrùgǔ de chōngdòng xià ， tā bǎ chóurén shā le
In a frenzy of hate he killed his enemy.

name: Happy, joyous
description: give a wee smile, smile faintly
be radiant with smiles; be all smiles; one's smiles were thick enough to pluck off one's face
be pleasantly surprised; be overjoyed (at an unexpected gain, good news, etc.); joy beyond (all) expectations
overwhelmed/overcome with joy; extremely happy; outright glee; one's joy knew no bounds

微微一笑
wēi wēi yī xiào
他向她微微一笑
tā xiàng tā wēiwēiyīxiào
He gave her a faint smile
她带着优越感微微一笑
tā dàizhe yōuyuègǎn wēiwēiyīxiào
She smiled in a condescending way.

笑容可掬
xiào róng kě jū
他一跃而起，笑容可掬
tā yīyuèérqǐ xiàoróngkějū

喜出望外

听说我们队得了冠军，大家都喜出望外
tīngshuō wǒmenduì dé le guànjūn dàjiādōu xǐchūwàngwài
他见到她的第一反应竟是喜出望外
tā jiàndào tā de dì yī fǎnyìng jìng shì xǐchūwàngwài

tā yīnwèi zhòngle cǎipiào ér lèbùkězhī

name: Grief, sorrow
description: weep in grief
felt like weeping but had no tears
lose control and cry out loud
sob inconsolably; cry so hard that no sound comes out; choke with sobs; feel extremely sad

shāng xīn luò lèi

欲哭无泪
yù kū wú lèi
这次打击之大使她欲哭无泪
zhècì dǎjī zhīdà shǐ tā yùkūwúlèi
The intensity of the blow made her unabled to cry

tā rúcǐ tǐtiēguānxīn wǒ rěnbuzhù shīshēngtòngkū
Because he was being so kind and concerned, I broke down andcried

泣不成声

shuōdào shāngxīnchù tā qìbùchéngshēng

潸然泪下
shān rán lèi xià

wǒ zhāngzuǐ huídá què shānránlèixià

Some of the young ladies dissolve very easily into tears.

name: Wisdom, intelligence
description: be erudite and well-informed; have a wide knowledge of things both ancient and modern
predict like a prophet; foresee with divine precision
wise and resourceful; be very full of guile
gain a thorough understanding of something; achieve mastery through a comprehensive study of the subject
be well versed in the learning of both Chinese and Western cultures; have a thorough knowledge of both western and traditional Chinese medicine
be full of wit; brim with talent
outstanding; above the common herd
extensive and profound
benefit by mutual discussion; draw on collective wisdom and absorb all useful ideas
draw inferences about other cases from one instance; infer other things from one fact
answer:
博古通今
bó gǔ tōng jīn
博古通今的专家
bógǔtōngjīn de zhuānjiā
erudite and informed scholar

料事如神
liào shì rú shén
我又不能料事如神，总不免要吃点小亏
wǒ yòu bùnéng liàoshìrúshén zǒng bùmiǎn yào chīdiǎn xiǎokuī
Foretellthings like a prophet, I cannot help taking a small loss

这些妇女坚强勇敢，足智多谋

yīgè hǎode jiànzhùshī wǎngwǎng rónghuìguàntōng fùyǒu chuàngzàoxìng
A good architect is always achieving mastery through a comprehensive study of the subject and creative

学贯中西
xué guàn zhōng xī
他学贯中西，博古通今，在诗歌、学术研究以及翻译三个领域成就斐然
tā xuéguànzhōngxī bógǔtōngjīn zài shīgē xuéshù yánjiū yǐjí fānyì sāngè lǐngyù chéngjiù fěirán
With his knowledge expanding to cover both the West and the East as well as ancient and modern learning, he has made brilliant achievements in the field of poetry, academic research and translation

才华横溢
cái huá héng yì
他是一个才华横溢的科学家
tā shì yīgè cáihuáhéngyì de kēxuéjiā
He's a brilliant scientist

出类拔萃
chū lèi bá cuì
与大多数的同代作家相比，狄更斯更为出类拔萃
yù dàduōshù de tóngdài zuòjiā xiāngbǐ dígēngsī gèngwéi chūlèibácuì
Dickens was in a different class from most of his contemporaries

博大精深
bó dà jīng shēn
中华传统文化博大精深
zhōnghuá chuántǒng wénhuà bódàjīngshēn
Traditional Chinese culture is extensive and profound

集思广益
jí sī guǎng yì
只有走群众路线，集思广益，才能把工作做好
zhǐyǒu zǒu qúnzhònglùxiàn jísīguǎngyì cáinéng bǎ gōngzuò zuòhǎo
Only by following the mass line and listening to all useful opinions can we make a good job of it

举一反三
jǔ yī fǎn sān
在学习上要学会举一反三，触类旁通
zài xuéxí shang yào xuéhuì jǔyīfǎnsān chùlèipángtōng
Try to learn by analogy and judge the whole from the part
